sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: JPG image, around 1440px x 610px

sub_fields.label: Local URL
sub_fields.name: local_url
sub_fields.instructions: Link to your MP4 video file.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: product_header_aria_title
sub_fields.instructions: Not shown on page but placed as an H1 in the html to satisfy SEO purposes

sub_fields.label: Link or PDF
sub_fields.name: product_header_link_choice
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between a traditional link or attaching a PDF.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: fc_image
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended size: 720px x 500px.  Recommended file extension: jpg

sub_fields.label: Avatar
sub_fields.name: avatar
sub_fields.instructions: JPG file, 100px x 100px

sub_fields.label: Contain
sub_fields.name: image_spread_contain
sub_fields.instructions: Check if you want the image to stay contained to the window.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: image_spread_position
sub_fields.instructions: Which side do you want your text?  If text is on the left, image will show on the right.  If text is on the right, image will show on the left.

sub_fields.label: Position of Content
sub_fields.name: image_cta_position
sub_fields.instructions: Choose position of your content.  'Right' will position text on the right and image on the left.  'Left' will position text on the left and image on the right.

sub_fields.label: Show Links?
sub_fields.name: locations_show_links
sub_fields.instructions: Check to show the link for each location

sub_fields.label: Centered
sub_fields.name: text_block_centered
sub_fields.message: Check this box to align center

sub_fields.label: Background White
sub_fields.name: text_block_background_white
sub_fields.message: Check this box to fill the background white

sub_fields.label: Content Alignment
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_content_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Controls whether the copy will be on the left or the right, defaults to placing the copy on the left side of the block.

sub_fields.label: Block Title
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_block_title
sub_fields.instructions: The centered block title, above the video and content, will be an h2.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_title
sub_fields.instructions: The title for the content area next to the video.

sub_fields.label: Title Image
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_title_image
sub_fields.instructions: An image for the content area next to the video. Not recommended to be combined with the title above.

sub_fields.label: Icon Grid?
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_icon_grid
sub_fields.instructions: Enables or disables the icon grid below the paragraph content and links. Defaults to disabled.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Type
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_ui_screen_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether you are using an image/gif, or embedding a video.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Corner Flare
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_ui_screen_corner_flare
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a blue accent to the corner of the screen.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Image
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_ui_screen_image
sub_fields.instructions: This block is used for screenshots of interfaces, if you are using stock photography, use the image spread component.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Video Type
sub_fields.name: ui_spread_ui_screen_video_type
sub_fields.instructions: Where is this video hosted?

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Video URL
sub_fields.name: ui_screen_video_url
sub_fields.instructions: This is the YouTube or Vimeo URL.

sub_fields.label: Background White
sub_fields.name: column_text_background_white
sub_fields.message: Check this box for a white background

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Type
sub_fields.name: ui_header_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether you are using an image/gif, or embedding a video.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Image
sub_fields.name: ui_header_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is a screenshot or gif of the interface you are looking to showcase. The browser bar is added automatically.

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Video Type
sub_fields.name: ui_header_video_type
sub_fields.instructions: Where is this video hosted?

sub_fields.label: UI Screen Video URL
sub_fields.name: ui_header_video_url
sub_fields.instructions: This is the YouTube or Vimeo URL.

sub_fields.label: Video Type
sub_fields.name: video_type
sub_fields.instructions: Where is this video hosted?

sub_fields.label: Video Type
sub_fields.name: video_type
sub_fields.instructions: Where is this video hosted?

sub_fields.label: Video Spread Section ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions: You can add a name here that will anchor to this section.  For example, serenova.com/#your-name-here.  When you reference, it use the "#".  But not when adding it here.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: image_spread_position
sub_fields.instructions: Which side do you want your text?  If text is on the left, image will show on the right.  If text is on the right, image will show on the left.

sub_fields.label: Bottom Text
sub_fields.name: pricing_text_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: This text will show up under the pricing table, which is auto added to the page with this component

sub_fields.label: Script
sub_fields.name: form_embed_script
sub_fields.instructions: This is the script or iframe embed for a third party embed. Please note, this field can have adverse affects on the site if improperly used or if bad code is placed in here. USE CAREFULLY!
